description: Pruning of 6 limes at r/o 1-5 John Spencer Square and one in middle lawn overhanging pavement. (Works:- Lime Trees in 5 John Spencer Square: Crown lift clear of upper floor of house.Reduce height by one third.Thin deadwood and reshape. Lime Trees in 1-4 John Spencer Square: Reduce height by one third.Remove branches overhanging adjacent public house.Reshape but retain lower lateral or horizontal branches so as to effect screening. Crab Apple - Middle Lawn: Remove overhanging branches over public footway and lift over opposite end.Balance crown. )
decision_conditions: The work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendations of British Standard 3998 : 1966 'Tree Work'.
